description:
Mashumairesh!! goes to watch Criticrista play on the popular music show, Music Terminal, and they run into REIJINGSIGNAL, who are also playing that day.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Kyukyukyun Heart Shaker na Ain`t Nobody Stop
Sq-Sq-Squeeze Heart Shaker and Ain`t Nobody Stop
きゅきゅきゅん♥ハートシェイカーなain`t nobody STOP
